For reference, I'm 5'9" and 170lbs with a 38" bust, and I ordered size XXL. The shirt is oversized already and I think even size L would fit ok, but I like my blouses to be really big and loose anyway. The fabric is very nice and drapey with a crinkly-look. The fabric isn't see-thru, but it isn't too thick either so it can be tucked in, which is how I prefer to wear it. The material has a tiny bit of stretch. The sleeves aren't too tight so they can be comfortably worn pushed up, and the overall style is great for a dressy or casual look. This is such a great, versatile shirt that I just ordered another color.

评论概述: Cute but sleeves are shorter than 3/4
评论详情: I love the style & look of this shirt but I was really upset when I saw how short the sleeves actually are. They’re listed as 3/4 & in the pictures they look like full lantern sleeves, but in person they’re pretty short…above the elbow short. When worn it’s possible to make them look a bit longer by using the oversized fit of the bust but they shorten right up if you lift your arms or move in certain ways. Otherwise the top is exactly as pictured & really cute. The oversized fit is comfortable but not sloppy looking bc of the attention to the detail in the design.  I think the neckline & pleat in the front add style to something that may otherwise look sloppy & make it possible to dress it up or down easily. It’s made from a lightweight breezy material that reminds a lot of linen & like linen it doesn’t really have stretch to it, but the oversized fit more than makes up for the lack of stretch. The top is well made as I haven’t found any flaws or loose threads & is made by a company that tends to have nice & unique clothing. The sizing is spot on but if you want a less oversized fit I’d say to size down. I also find the price point to be fair & would definitely recommend this top.
Cute top I just should’ve sized down!!!!

I was surprised when I received this top. I was surprised the top was so slippery, I thought it had more cotton in the top. The shiny fabric gives it more of a dressy look. The top has a collar and medium V-neck cut. It has 3/4 length sleeves with 4 inches of rouching elastic. When you lift up your arm the sleeve slides above the elbow.  This top sizes larger than your normal sizing. It is unflattering to a larger size body. The top is well-made and will look good on a slim person.
